tool.name: Query
tool.description: Lists all keys that match the query.
tool.help:
Obtains a list of ID values for documents in MASC that match the specified query.
Only simple queries based on simple path matching is available at the moment. The following terms may be used:
1. data 2. spoken 3. court-transcript 4. debate-transcript 5. face-to-face 6. telephone 7. written 8. blog 9. email 10. enron 11. spam 12. w3c 13. essays 14. ficlets 15. fiction 16. govt-docs 17. jokes 18. journal 19. letters 20. philanthropic-fundraising 21. solicitation-brochures 22. movie-script 23. newspaper 24. nyt 25. unknown 26. wsj 27. non-fiction 28. technical 29. travel-guides 30. twitter
Queries do **not** support wildcards.
